body_html: @andrewrech Yeah the new version of macOS comming this fall supports eGPU, but not supporting the built in graphics would be a bummer for me as I was not planning on buying an NVIDIA card, just to play with Tensorflow. From my understanding just supporting Metal in Tensorflow means that it supports most of the GPU's connected to the computer?
